mapper.insert: INSERT INTO club SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), leaderId = #{loginedMemberId}, `name`= #{name}, region = #{region}, categoryId = #{categoryId};
mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS 'id', AVG(m.age) AS 'avgAge' FROM `member` m INNER JOIN club c ON m.clubId = c.id GROUP BY c.id;
SELECT c.id AS 'id', COUNT(m.id) AS 'membersCount' FROM club c INNER JOIN `member` m ON c.id = m.clubId GROUP BY c.id;
